CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7210 SAS-S/Sx",'sample text',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "LightspanSX", 'The Lightspan SX is a Compact, Sealed Box Wall-mountable standalone remote unit, depending on the combination it supports:'&BR()&'- 8 or 16 ports'&BR()&'- can be used indoor or outdoor'&BR()&'- reverse power or reverse power in combination with AC power'&BR()&'- 160 Mhz or 212 Mhz G.fast'&BR()&'- one uplink'&BR()&'No specific cables are in Nokia Portfolio. Power and copper pair cables should be provided by customer.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7750SR1",'Please select if you would like an additional AC PSU for redundancy.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "AirScaleWiFi",'Do not use installed base for captive portal extensions.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Compact Mobility Unit 20.0 Operating Software on a 32 GB installation / system recovery USB.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7705SAR18",'Select if you require redundant Control Switch Modules. (If not selected, only one CSM will be added to the shopping cart.)',"To include AMS in your quote select the 3AP38518AAAA from the catalogue."))))))
CustomField.label: Guidance
